name: esus-audit-ai
description: AI-powered audit automation platform for finance and audit firms with Supabase integration

scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm run start:client" "npm run start:server"
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server"
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd client && npm test" "cd server && npm test"
scripts.db:setup: psql -d esusauditai -f database/schema.sql && psql -d esusauditai -f database/seed.sql

author: Esus Audit AI Team
